body.name: Gentle Hydrating Facial Cleanser with Ceramides + Hyaluronic Acid to Moisturize. Face Cleanser for Women and Men. Face Wash + Face Care + Make Up Remover. Combination to Dry Skin Care (150ml)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 14 hrs 25 mins
features: DERMATOLOGICALLY APPROVED FACIAL CLEANSER - for dry and combination skin. A gentle non foaming, PH balanced, moisturizing face wash that lifts impurities without stripping your skin's surface, with active ingredients to leave skin soft, clean and clear

CLINICALLY PROVEN TO HELP PREVENT BREAKOUTS - keep future skin stress at bay with a clarifying blend of Niacinamide + gentle face cleansers that work together to remove make up, dirt and impurities from your pores for a clear, healthy complexion
SKIN BARRIER PROTECTING CERAMIDES – gentle face cleanser skincare powered by 3 skin fortifying Ceramides, clinically proven to strengthen the skin barrier after cleansing

ALL DAY HYDRATION - this facewash is powered by a complex of Hyaluronic Acid, 3 skin-fortifying Ceramides and Glycerin, which binds water to the skin’s surface to restore moisture after cleansing that lasts all day

100% VEGAN and CRUELTY FREE - kind to both your skin and the planet, this cruelty-free facial wash is made of the highest-quality vegan ingredients, is alcohol-free and fragrance-free, with packaging made from recycled materials, and is carbon neutral
body.description: Coats Gentle Hydrating Cleanser Non-foaming, gentle facial cleanser gel with Hyaluronic Acid, Ceramides, and Niacinamide. A pH-balanced formula with clinically proven cleansing power that helps prevent future breakouts without stripping your skin, whilst helping to protect your skin barrier for a clear, bright, healthy complexion and all-day hydration. This face wash is Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Paraben Free, and SLS free.

A pH-balanced formula with clinically proven cleansing power that helps prevent future breakouts without stripping your skin, whilst helping to protect your skin barrier for a clear, bright, healthy complexion and all-day hydration. This face wash is Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Paraben Free, and SLS free. Skin Clarity: Mandelic Acid + Niacinamide Skin Hydration: Polyglutamic Acid + Ceramides + Squalane PREvents Breakouts: Blend of Niacinamide + Gentle Surfactants Pollutions and Free Radicals, Antioxidants: Vitamin C + Vitamin E Damage from Environmental Stress: Vitamin E + Signal Tripeptides

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Doesn’t foam up! I love that it just stays thick and you can really feel what parts of your face have gotten washed. Great for dry skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE this face wash. I have tried dozens, looking for the right combination of really cleaning while protecting my skin barrier. I have fairly sensitive skin with some rosacea and occasional breakouts from it. This face wash has helped tremendously and my skin is super soft and smooth. Never going back! Note- don’t expect a foaming wash. You could compare it to Cereve’s hydrating face wash but this is much better, with a cleaner formula.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this cleanser, but it did come unsealed and not in a box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Mine arrived opened and partially spilled. No box either. Makes me weary

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Anyone else receive without a box?
reviews.reviewText: I ordered their moisturizer which that came in a box separately but when I ordered their face wash it didn't come in a box which has me wondering was this used....? There's no safety seal to prevent bacteria contamination.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Great product gentle on the skin
reviews.reviewText: I really enjoy using this cleanser, it cleans my skin well without leaving it feeling completely stripped and dry (I have combo skin and get oily afterwards). I like using this with my Foreo Luna device and it lathers up pretty well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: The best cleanser I’ve ever used
reviews.reviewText: I’ve used many cleansers over the years and none (I repeat none) of them compare to this one. I hope they never discontinue this one because I had to buy a different cleanser for a few days use when this cleanser was out of stock and it was a nightmare.I double cleanse in the evening and this feels like the most luxurious cleanser. It works so well to remove all the build up you get in the day and leaves your skin so hydrated and soft. The ingredients are so great and the consistency is thick. It doesn’t dry out your skin and it does so much.I don’t normally review cleansers but this one needs the review. As much as I don’t want it to be out of stock the next time I purchase I have to share this amazing cleanser.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Gentle in my skin and doesnt feel like it strips the skin. Just leaves it clean.
reviews.reviewText: I have enjoyed including this in my night time skincare routine. It doesnt make my skin feel dry when i use it and a little bit goes a long way. The reason why it doesnt get 4 starts is that its priced at a premium but I packaging etc don't denote a premium experience in my opinion. Great ingredients that are moisturizing to the skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 3, 2024
Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 24, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I completely understand that this is just my personal preference but I really prefer face washes that lather up, this is so creamy it doesn't and I don't like that feeling on my face, plus I feel like I use more.I used this after a day of regular wear make up and it took 4 washes before the water was clear so don't think it does a very good job of cleaning.To be fair my skin didn't feel stripped after using but wouldn't buy again.
